item.description:
Over the river and thru the woods to Boston University we will return...

Last week's incubator at Boston University was very successful and we'll be there again this week!

Other than the new location it's the same as before, just bring your improving selves and a dollar for an evening of fun! There will be signs once you come in the building directing you to Room 167.

Afterward we can go 1 block down Comm Ave for snacks at the Sunset Cantina.

This area also has a plentiful on-street parking!

Detailed directions can be found here: http://www.bu.edu/cfa...
If you have any questions about getting there, just email Lisa
item.how_to_find_us: Enter the building and follow the signs to room 167
item.name: Incubate across the River - Improv at BU
